The files in this directory are exactly the same as the ones in ZDF. Even if DA Mod Manager says there is a conflict, there isn't.

genpt_zevran_defined.ncs is used to fix Zevran at the Denerim gates.
clipt_morrigan_ritual.ncs is used to fix Alistair knowing about the ritual.
epipt_main_zdf.ncs/plo is used to fix some conditions regarding who is the Bann of the Alienage in the epilogue.
zdf_mrp_shared.ncs/plo is used for some party banter fixes and Alistair knowing about the ritual.
